summary: Security Council Report (Feb 1, 2026) explicitly states no UNGA initiatives were pursued on Venezuela
content: The Security Council Report's February 2026 Monthly Forecast ("In Hindsight: The Security Council's Muted Response to the Venezuela Crisis") published Feb 1, 2026 states: "About a month has passed since the US operation, which many describe as a seismic event, yet there have been no proposals for a Council product or a meeting to follow up on developments in the country. There have also been no initiatives to discuss the matter at the General Assembly." This is near-dispositive evidence that no UNGA resolution was adopted before Feb 1, 2026.
